name: Kyurem
author: Shiburingaru
flavor_text: Dwelling within it is a power even greater than that of Reshiram or Zekrom, but the extreme cold keeps that power bound.

abilities.name: Plasma Bane
abilities.effect: If your opponent has any cards in their discard pile that have “Colress” in the name, this Pokémon can use the Trifrost attack for {C}.

attacks.name: Trifrost
attacks.effect: Discard all Energy from this Pokémon. This attack does 110 damage to 3 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
